sense.gloss: deferment (e.g. of savings), leaving (a thing) as it stands
unredeemed, unredeemable, irredeemable, deferred, stationary
to place (in position), to fix, to set (e.g. table), to lay (foundation)
to install, to seat (someone)
to settle (upon something), to fix (e.g. one's gaze)
to apply (moxa)
to stare fixedly at, to fix one's gaze on
to make sure of, to set one's eyes on (e.g. the future), to focus on
installation, setting, fitting, mounting
to install, to equip, to mount
to sit, to squat
to assume (a position)
to hold steady, to hold still
to remain, to stay (somewhere)
to leave as it is, to defer
to cut down an enemy
to place firmly, to hit very hard
to make up one's mind
meal set before one
women's advances
deferred savings
period of deferment, grace period, interest-only period
to install (a person) in (someone's) place
to give (a guest) the seat of honor (honour)
diligence, assiduity, pinching, hard toil
to settle down (and deal with something), to concentrate all one's energy (on something)
to settle oneself (in a place), to settle down (somewhere), to settle in
to take a solid stance, to lower one's center of gravity (centre)
gutsy, fearless, unwavering
to have glazed eyes (when drunk, angry, etc.), to have glassy eyes
taking care of everything, no need to do anything
to have guts, to be unwavering in one's resolution
to sit down
to rake over the coals, to scold, to chastise, to roast
to burn moxa on the skin
to do with determination
ornament
dead body used to test a blade
unlicensed prostitute who always works out of the same cathouse
cannot suppress one's anger, cannot stomach
to (physically) force someone to sit down
with set eyes
to muster one's courage, to resolve oneself, to ready oneself for what is to come

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑将来↑↓しょうらい↓を↑見据↑↓みす↓えつつ、↑今↑↓いま↓そこにある↑危機↑↓きき↓を↑乗↑↓の↓り↑越↑↓こ↓えていかねばならない。
sdata.e: We have to look the future straight in the eye and prepare to get through the coming crisis.

sdata.j: バス↑料金↑↓りょうきん↓は２↑年間↑↓ねんかん↓↑据↑↓す↓えおかれてきた。
sdata.e: Bus rates have stayed the same for two years.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑議長↑↓ぎちょう↓に↑据↑↓す↓えることに↑誰↑↓だれ↓も↑異議↑↓いぎ↓を↑唱↑↓とな↓えなかった。
sdata.e: Nobody argued against choosing him as chairman.

sdata.j: ↑少↑↓しょう↓しは↑腰↑↓こし↓を↑据↑↓す↓えてやれ。
sdata.e: Settle down for a while and concentrate.

sdata.j: ↑招待↑↓しょうたい↓もしていないのに↑息子↑↓むすこ↓の↑友達↑↓ともだち↓がおしかけてきて↑二↑↓に↓↑週間↑↓しゅうかん↓も↑居↑↓い↓↑据↑↓す↓わった。
sdata.e: My son's friend imposed himself on us for two weeks.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はその↑仕事↑↓しごと↓に↑腰↑↓こし↓を↑据↑↓す↓えている。
sdata.e: He has settled down to the job.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑腰↑↓こし↓を↑据↑↓す↓えて↑仕事↑↓しごと↓に↑取↑↓と↓り↑掛↑↓か↓かった。
sdata.e: He settled down to his work.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑度胸↑↓どきょう↓を↑据↑↓す↓えて↑外人↑↓がいじん↓に↑話↑↓はな↓し↑掛↑↓か↓けた。
sdata.e: He mustered up his courage to talk to a foreigner.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑横柄↑↓おうへい↓な↑態度↑↓たいど↓は↑腹↑↓はら↓に↑据↑↓す↓えかねた。
sdata.e: I couldn't put up with her arrogant behavior.

sdata.j: ↑旅館↑↓りょかん↓は、↑上↑↓あ↓げ↑膳据↑↓ぜんす↓え↑膳↑↓ぜん↓がうれしいね。
sdata.e: At a Japanese-style inn, they take care of your every need, so you don't have to lift a finger.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑腹↑↓はら↓が↑据↑↓す↓わっている。
↑中央↑↓ちゅうおう↓には↑机↑↓つくえ↓が↑据↑↓す↓えられていて、↑赤↑↓あか↓い↑革↑↓かわ↓↑張↑↓ば↓りの↑回転↑↓かいてん↓↑椅子↑↓いす↓がそえてあった。
sdata.e: A desk stood in the centre, with a red leather swivel chair.

sdata.j: ↑男↑↓おとこ↓でも↑女↑↓おんな↓でも↑腹↑↓はら↓が↑据↑↓す↓わっているってのはカッコいいですよね。
sdata.e: People are cool when they're gutsy, doesn't matter if they're men or women.

sdata.j: わたしは↑近眼↑↓きんがん↓のせいもありましょうが、↑机↑↓つくえ↓は↑明↑↓あか↓るいところに↑据↑↓す↓えなければ、↑読↑↓よ↓むことも↑書↑↓か↓くことも↑出来↑↓でき↓ません。
sdata.e: It might be because I am near-sighted, but I can't read or write if my desk is not in a brightly lit place.
